# Gaze Direction Configuration Values
# Generated by Cor Gaze Detection Library
# Last Updated: Auto-generated during calibration

# Gaze Estimation Parameters
gaze_estimation_method=pupil_center
# Method: pupil_center, corneal_reflection, or hybrid

gaze_sensitivity_x=1.0
# Horizontal gaze sensitivity multiplier (0.1 - 3.0)

gaze_sensitivity_y=1.0
# Vertical gaze sensitivity multiplier (0.1 - 3.0)

gaze_offset_x=0
# Horizontal gaze offset in pixels

gaze_offset_y=0
# Vertical gaze offset in pixels

# Pupil-to-Gaze Mapping
pupil_to_gaze_ratio_x=0.8
# Horizontal pupil movement to gaze ratio (0.3 - 1.5)

pupil_to_gaze_ratio_y=0.8
# Vertical pupil movement to gaze ratio (0.3 - 1.5)

gaze_center_x=0.5
# Normalized center X position for gaze mapping (0.0 - 1.0)

gaze_center_y=0.5
# Normalized center Y position for gaze mapping (0.0 - 1.0)

# Smoothing and Filtering
gaze_smoothing_factor=0.3
# Temporal smoothing factor for gaze trajectory (0.0 - 0.8)

velocity_smoothing_enabled=true
# Enable velocity-based smoothing

acceleration_limit=500
# Maximum allowed gaze acceleration (pixels/frameÂ²)

# Confidence and Quality Control
min_confidence_threshold=0.7
# Minimum confidence for valid gaze detection (0.5 - 0.95)

max_gaze_angle=45
# Maximum allowed gaze angle from center (degrees)

gaze_stability_threshold=5
# Maximum gaze jitter for stable detection (pixels)

# Geometric Calibration
screen_width_mm=340
# Physical screen width in millimeters

screen_height_mm=190
# Physical screen height in millimeters

viewing_distance_mm=600
# Distance from eyes to screen in millimeters

# Eye Model Parameters
eye_radius_mm=12
# Average eye radius in millimeters

# Average cornea radius in millimeters

pupil_center_offset_x=0
# Horizontal offset of pupil center from eye center (mm)

pupil_center_offset_y=0
# Vertical offset of pupil center from eye center (mm)

# Top-left calibration point (normalized coordinates)

calibration_point_2_y=0.1
# Top-right calibration point

calibration_point_3_y=0.5
# Center calibration point

calibration_point_4_y=0.9
# Bottom-left calibration point

calibration_point_5_x=0.9
calibration_point_5_y=0.9
# Bottom-right calibration point

# Advanced Gaze Features
saccade_detection_enabled=true
# Enable saccadic eye movement detection

saccade_velocity_threshold=300
# Minimum velocity for saccade detection (pixels/frame)

fixation_duration_threshold=100
# Minimum duration for fixation detection (milliseconds)

microsaccade_detection=false
# Enable detection of small eye movements during fixation

# Binocular Gaze Processing
binocular_averaging=true
# Average gaze direction from both eyes

eye_dominance_factor=0.6
# Weight factor for dominant eye (0.5 = equal, 1.0 = dominant only)

vergence_angle_compensation=true
# Compensate for vergence angle in depth perception

# Environmental Adaptation
lighting_adaptation_enabled=true
# Adapt to changing lighting conditions

pupil_dilation_compensation=true
# Compensate for pupil size changes

head_pose_compensation=false
# Compensate for head rotation and tilt
